MicroWrath
Table of Contents

Class Deferred<A>

Namespace
MicroWrath.Deferred
Assembly
MicroWrath.dll

Deferred execution context returning A. Canonical implementation of IDeferred<A>. The return value is memoized ie. execution of Eval() only invokes the underlying function once.

See also: Lazy<T>, IObservable<T>

internal class Deferred<A> : IDeferred<A>, IObserver<Unit>
